'''2.2.1164''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.1166''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.1165''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on January 5, 2021 and is the first beta released in 2021.

== Changes ==
* Redesigned how news articles are displayed.
** News for each game is now under its own page
** All news can still be found in the "News" tab.
* The play button is now sticky.
* Moved the ''Java Edition'' profile name back next to the play button.
* Made the 'No cape' string translatable.
* The version manifest fetching now triggers on reconnection.

== Fixes ==
* Deleting skins with very long names no longer escapes modal
* {{bug|MCL-15652}} - Disabling Wi-Fi while the Microsoft login page is open without any information entered and pressing the Back button results in -106 error message
* {{bug|MCL-16222}} - Launcher "fails to respond" (swirling symbol)
